summary: convert vanilla and DLCs helmets to shields
descriptionHtml: I am not good at English, sorry.I dont like to wear helmets on my head. I think it is not stylish. So, I made this mod for Saint Seiya RP.Â This mod adds the shields which have the appearance of helmets. For example, you can create the shield named as "Iron helmet" at the smithing forge when you have Iron Helmets. These shields can be temmpered and be converted to helmets, too.These shields have the keyward of "ArmorHelmet", "ArmorShield" and "ArmorHeavy/Light". Therefore, you can enchant the magical effects for shield and helmet, and these shields enable armor perks of Custom Fit, Matching Set and so on.
author: yymmdd2
